title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 151.1 - New York State income tax returns and liabilities-general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 151.1 - New York State income tax returns and liabilities-general

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 651

In general, except as otherwise provided in this

Subchapter, the rules and tests described in the Internal Revenue Code and its
applicable regulations with respect to the requirements for filing Federal
income tax returns and liabilities for payment of income tax of any individual, estate or trust, including the filing requirements concerning partnerships, also apply in determining the filing requirements and income tax liabilities
for New York State personal income tax purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
151.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
